projects.name: Database Migration Tool
achievements: Architected RESTful API using Data Movement Library, React & .NET for multi-terabyte database transfers
Developed intuitive file management interface and real-time dashboard streamlining data operations
Achieved 90% test coverage, cutting production incidents by 20%

projects.name: Enterprise Application Platform
achievements: Consolidated multiple apps into single .NET & React webapp, reducing maintenance costs by 35%
Built modern React UI with optimized caching, reducing load times by 30%
Automated file processing workflow using Python scripts, reducing 1-hour process to 10 minutes

projects.name: Financial Trading System
achievements: Led 5-member team to build .NET trading system with MySQL
Applied N-tier architecture principles to build enterprise applications
Leveraged Agile methodologies to deliver project milestones on schedule
Created an ML model for forecasting sales using Python, achieving 80% accuracy
Data Visualization using Power BI, creating interactive dashboards and reports that displayed key insights and trends for decision making
